message: Hello Bob, I have an exceptional product that I'm offering for sale. I would like to propose a price of $1200000 for it. Please let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. Considering similar options available to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1000000 for the product. Let me know if this can work for you!
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, I would like to propose a price of $1100000 for the product. I believe this reflects its true value. Let me know if this works for you!
